response.job_title: Fullstack Software Engineering Especialist at ScotiaGBS Colombia del grupo Scotiabank
response.summary:
ABOUT ME:

I am a big fan of video-games, including MMOs (massively multi-player online) where I have made an effort to play with "gamers" from all over the world, in order to not only face the difficulties of a team game, but also the language and cultural barriers; I love the well told stories, I always try to keep an open mind knowing that perspective and context are the most important factors in how we understand the world.

I am always willing to ask, with the aim of understanding and thus being able to propose solutions or express my concerns if I feel that something is out of place; I also find great value in supporting my team mates and sharing knowledge so that the growth is shared. 

Making mistakes, learning the lesson and moving on, trying to prepare as well as possible to face the uncertain future, all these things are part of the learning experience that comes, I have my own "Bushido" and my word is the thing that I most value.

SOFT SKILLS:

Leadership:
Look on how I can support my team or whatever project I am working on.

Diligent:
To do things right the first time, even if that means taking some extra time.

Communication:
To be kind but direct and express myself in a clear and concise way.

TECHNICAL SKILLS:

Languages:

- BackEnd:
Java, JavaEE (Spring - SpringBoot), JSF (PrimeFaces), Jax-RS (REST web services), Jax-WS (SOAP web services), JPA (Hibernate - Envers), SQL, MySQL, Postgres SQL, Oracle SQL.
   
- FrontEnd:
HTML, CSS, Java-Script, TypeScript (Angular), GWT.

- Others:
Bash, YAML, XML, JSON.

Development tools:

- Packages Management:
Maven, Gradle.

- Source Quality:
SonarQube.

- Testing
JUnit, Mokito.

- Data Base CM tools:
Liquibase.

Platforms:

- Source Management:
Git, SubVersion.

- DevOps (Continues Integration):
Azure DevOps, Jenkins.

- Application Servers:
Jboss (WildFly), TomCat - TomEE, SpringBoot, Payara Micro.

- Container Managers:
Docker

- Cloud Services:
Amazon AWS (EC2, SES)

- Project Management:
Atlassian (Jira, Trello, Confluence)

Operative systems:

- UNIX - GNU/LINUX:
Debian, RedHat, Centos.

- Windows

EDUCATION:

INGENIERÍA DE SISTEMAS Y COMPUTACIÓN
Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
Graduated in April 3, 2017.

FIFTH INTERNATIONAL PROFESSORSHIP OF ENGINEERING
New trends in software maintenance and evolution.
Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
2011.

JUMP-CAMP
Video game Development Strengthening Program.
Universidad de los Andes, Min-tic, Colciencias
2014 – II

WEB PROGRAMMING IN JAVA JEE
Instituto de Extensión e Investigación IEI
Faculty of Engineering
Universidad Nacional de Colombia

response.skills: IntelliJ IDEA, TypeScript, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Oracle SQL Developer, Azure DevOps Server, Docker, Jenkins, Jakarta EE, HTML5, SQL, HTML, JavaEE, Java, MySQL, Amazon Web Services (AWS), JUnit, Eclipse, PostgreSQL, Bash

profile_positions.description:
Achieved Tasks:

    • I am part of the team that is designing and developing an application in charge of consolidating the status of all the employees who carry out transactions in stock exchanges and who must be monitored by the Scotiabank, called EIP-Step, using: TypeScript, Java, JavaEE, Jax- RS, JUnit - Mockito, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, JPA – Hibernate - Envers, Spring – JDBC Template, SQL – Oracle, AzureDev-Ops
      
    • I designed and developed a small framework for the EIP-Step that use the decorator pattern to manages the execution of EODs (End of the day jobs) and stores logs of the results of their executions in the database, using Spring – AspectJ, Spring – JDBC Template, SQL – Oracle.
      
    • I am also part of the team that maintains the application called PTA-Step, this is a legacy application that will be replaced by EIP-Step, using: Java, JavaEE, Spring Framework, Jax-RS, JUnit - Mockito, Spring – JDBC Template, SQL – Oracle, TomCat, Docker, Jenkins.
      
    • Designed and developed a build pipeline and a deploy pipeline for the EIP-Step application that automatically manages version control and the creation of "release/" branches in git, writes the version in the gradle.properties to be printed during the deployment (in addition to a Rest service so it can be displayed on the FrontEnd), it also ensures that all the necessary resources for its proper functioning are present in the bank's private cloud servers, this includes integration with Sonar-Jacoco, Fortify, password request by consuming the bank’s API, using: AzureDev-Ops and Bash.
profile_positions.title: Fullstack Software Engineering Associate

profile_positions.description:
Achieved Tasks:

    • I developed new features for a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) it was a home brewed development and it was adjusted for each of their clients, my goal was to adjust the application to the needs of each client. This CRM is a client-server application and I used: Jboss , GWT, HTML, JavaScript, JavaEE, JMS, Jax-RS, JPA – Hibernate – Envers, PostgreSQL.
      
    • I managed a private cloud of virtual machines with Centos 6 operating systems, in which the CRM instances that had been designed by me run, I achieved my task using: SSH, Bash, Cron
      
    • I Developed multiple ETLs using: Talend Open Studio (Java).
profile_positions.title: Senior Developer

profile_positions.description:
Achieved Tasks:

    • I implemented an application in charge of sending emails and managing black lists of email addresses, using: PayaraMicro, JavaEE, Jax-RS, JUnit – Mockito, AWS–EC2, AWS–SES, JPA, MySQL.
      
    • I participated in the implementation of a custom XML translator to the UBL standard defined by the DIAN for Electronic Invoicing, using: JavaEE, AWS–EC2, JPA, JUnit - Mockito, MySQL.
profile_positions.title: Developer - Cofounder

company.name: Facele Colombia | Proveedor de Facturación Electrónica.

profile_positions.company: Facele Colombia | Proveedor de Facturación Electrónica.
profile_positions.description:
Achieved Tasks:

    • Define an agile framework for the team, managing ceremonies and removing impediments, using the Scrum methodology.
      
    • Design an application defined in an architecture based on microservices using messaging queues for the management and sending of emails massively, using: TomEE, JavaEE, Jax-RS, JMS, JUnit – Mockito, ActiveMQ, AWS–EC2, AWS–SES, JPA, MySQL.
      
    • I participated in the management, development and maintenance of a web-portal for the self-management of electronic documents, using: TomEE, JavaEE (JSF - PrimeFaces - HTML), JUnit - Mockito, AWS-EC2, JPA, MySQL.
      
    • Design a client-server application for managing application updates on remote machines (Windows and Linux) through a web portal, using: TomEE, JavaEE(JSF - PrimeFaces - HTML), Jax-RS, TomEE, AWS– EC2, JPA, JUnit - Mockito, MySQL.
      
    • I implemented a Colombian Electronic Invoicing platform, which was connected to the DIAN web-service and following the UBL standard sent, stored and tracked electronic documents; using: TomEE, JavaEE, Jax-RS, Jax-WS, JPA, JUnit – Mockito, MySQL, AWS–EC2, AWS-SES.
profile_positions.title: Software Development, Support and Programming Engineer

company.name: ScotiaGBS Colombia del grupo Scotiabank
company.description:
Somos el Centro de Servicios Globales de Scotiabank en Colombia, una compañía comprometida con la inclusión, el crecimiento profesional y el aporte social al país. Somos más de 4000 colaboradores, brindamos servicios a clientes y empleados del banco en todo el mundo a través de nuestras 8 Unidades de Servicio: Contact Centre, Cobranzas, Gestión del Fraude, Tecnología de la Información (TI), Finanzas, Recursos Humanos, Prevención de Lavado de Activos (AML) y Adquirencia.

valoramos y promovemos una cultura organizacional basada en la inclusión, diversidad, igualdad y respeto. Trabajando cada día por ser la compañía donde todos quieren y pueden trabajar. Nuestras instalaciones cuentan con la tecnología y los elementos necesarios para proporcionar un ambiente laboral único donde cada persona pueda crecer personal y profesionalmente. 

Además de nuestro compromiso con el crecimiento profesional de nuestros empleados, también nos preocupamos por el aporte social en Colombia. Colaboramos con diversas organizaciones y proyectos que buscan generar un impacto positivo en nuestra sociedad.
